titles.title: Agency Accountability through Appropriations Act
Agency Accountability through Appropriations Act
To establish procedures to reduce agency funding for failure to adhere to original congressional intent, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
